page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES (1 of 2)
page.content:
The games we play at home include cricket, soccer, netball and tennis.
Here are some other games:-
In {Kick-the-Can}you play with a can and a person has to find the ones who have hidden, after he has counted to forty. When he finds a person he runs to kick the can and says that person's name. The first person caught is 'it' and the game starts again when everybody has been caught.
In{Wall Ball}two people play the game. You have to kick the ball against a wall. When the ball rebounds the other person has to kick it first time. If you don't manage to do that, the other person has won.
